item.description:
Greetings Canucks!
As a chaser to last Thursday's Cambridge side patio get together, I thought I would switch to the southern side of the river and bring back an event we haven't done since the temperatures were cool. 
Join me in the Koch Gallery for super art, live tunes, and cash bars with cocktails/beer/wine. Relax and unwind in a great setting with friends both old and new.


Friday, June 1, 2012 5:30 pm - 9:30 pm
Gallery 250
Music: April Hall Trio (Vocalist, Piano, Upright Bass)
Cost: Regular Museum admission


I will arrive at the gallery at 6 pm, and will head up stairs after paying admission  to grab a brewskie. You can find me upstairs in the main hall, or you can call me on my cell at 617-221-2041.

You can arrive early if you want, and bring whomever you wish. Afterward for those interested we will head back into town to Emmets/6B Lounge by the Park Street T for 90s night.  If you can't make the MFA, but want to meetup after, rsvp, and indicate you'll hook up later.

Typical dress is business casual-ish.


It is a great time and a perfect way to bring in June!


http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-first-fridays

http://emmetsirishpubandrestaurant.com/

 

Cheers,

Bruce

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: MFA First Friday June!
